lines.content: Albot is your personal assistant Chatbot who will help you organize and keep track of your current tasks! :two_hearts:
He will also become your new best friend! Learn more about what he can do down below ~
**Here are the things Albot can do for you: :shipit:**
1. Add and delete tasks in the form of Todos, Deadlines, or Events
2. Mark a task as done or undone
3. Display a list containing all tasks
4. Find a task corresponding to substring provided
creates a ToDo and adds this to the task list

creates an Event and adds this to the task list
Got it! (๑˃ᴗ˂)ﻭ I've added this task:
Now you have 3 task(s) in the list! 凸(￣ヘ￣)
removes a task from the task list
Now you have 2 task(s) in the list! 凸(￣ヘ￣)
Nice! (〃＾▽＾〃) I've marked this task as done:
Well done completing your task, friend! (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧
OK, I've marked this task as not done yet:

But anyways bye! Hope to see you again soon, friend! (ɔ◔‿◔)ɔ ♥
This chatbot is named after someone special to me who makes me happier and a better person every single day! :two_hearts:

* Represents a parser to parse the user's input and
* calls the appropriate function depending on the command given (the first word).
* @param filePath Name of the file used to save tasks.
* @param tasks Array used to store all the tasks.
* @param numberOfTasks Number of tasks currently in the list.

*                       False if it has just been added by the user.

System.out.println("\tWell done completing your task, friend! (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧");

* Represents the UI messages that will be displayed to the user.
* Displays the divider to the user.
* Displays the greeting message to the user when the program is first run.
System.out.println("\tHello! I'm Albot, your new best friend! ᕙ(`▿´)ᕗ");
System.out.println("\tWhat can I do for you today, friend? ʕ•́ᴥ•̀ʔっ♡");
* Displays the exit message to the user when before exiting the program.
System.out.println("\tAww, you're leaving already? I'm gonna miss you (╥﹏╥)");
System.out.println("\tBut anyways bye! Hope to see you again soon, friend! (ɔ◔‿◔)ɔ ♥");
* Displays the Empty Description error message to the user.
System.out.println("\t☹ OOPS!!! The description of a task cannot be empty...");
* Displays the Unrecognized Command error message to the user.
System.out.println("\t☹ OOPS!!! I'm sorry, but I don't know what that means...");
* Displays the Index Out of Bounds error message to the user.
System.out.println("\t☹ OOPS!!! Please provide a valid task index...");
* Displays the File Loading error message to the user.
System.out.println("\t☹ OOPS!!! Unfortunately file is not found...");
* Represents a deadline that contains a description of the task, the due date of the deadline,
* and a boolean attribute to determine whether the task is done or not done.
* @param by Due date of the deadline.
* Represents a event that contains a description of the task, the date of the event,
* and a boolean attribute to determine whether the task is done or not done.
* Represents a task that contains a description of the task and a boolean attribute to determine whether
* the task is done or not done.
* Get the status icon of the task depending on whether it is done or not done.
* @return "X" if task is done. " " if task is not done.
